nodes.text: The Glacial Remnants was the name given to the remains of a glacier located in the northeastern corner of the Glacial Fissure region on the planet Hoth, adjacent to the Glacial Paths and the Upper Pass from the Highmount Ridge. The Galactic Republic's Outpost Senth was built beneath the Remnants.

The Glacial Remnants is a subregion of the Glacial Fissure sector of Hoth in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. The 2012 Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel made the Remnants into a Level 55 region where the Seeker Droid could be used.
